name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Clean and Green Energy Engineering
content: Publication: Submissions will be peer reviewed by the conference technical committees and internatioal reviewers. Accepted and presented papers at the conference will be published in the proceedings of CGEE 2022 and included into IEEE Xplore, which will be sent to EI Compendex, Scopus for indexing. A set of selected papers with extended version will be published into Journal of Clean Energy Technologies, which will be indexed by Inspec, Electronic Journals Library, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, ProQuest.
